name: Optical Communication Networks
content: An overview of communication networks, Optical transmission fundamentals and issues, IP traffic over WDM optical networks, Synchronous optical networks (SONET)/Synchronous digital hierarchy (SDH), WDM optical networks: optical circuit switching (OCS), WDM optical networks: optical packet switching (OPS), WDM optical networks: optical burst switching (OBS), Optical access networks, Other technologies, trends, and challenges.
